SEARCH
Module AM25_myShelfie
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Lobby
public class Lobby extends Object
This class represents the lobby. It creates the game, manage the game turn and keeps the chat, it sends the messages from the model the player to the game model.

      public Lobby(String lobbyCreator, String lobbyName, int playerNumber)
      Constructor for lobby
      Parameters:
      lobbyCreator - name of the creator of the lobby
      lobbyName - name of the lobby
      playerNumber - number of players in the lobby

  • Method Details

    • getLobbyName

      public String getLobbyName()
      getLobbyName is a getter for the name of the lobby
      Returns:
      the name of the lobby

    • getPlayerNumber

      public int getPlayerNumber()
      getPlayerNumber is a getter for the number of the player of the lobby
      Returns:
      the number of players in the lobby

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String name) throws NameTakenException, FullLobbyException, IllegalPlayerNameException
      Adds a player to the lobby
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of the player that want to join the lobby
      Throws:
      NameTakenException - if there is another player in the lobby with the same name
      FullLobbyException - if the lobby is full
      IllegalPlayerNameException - if the name is not valid or null

    • getOnlinePlayers

      public List<String> getOnlinePlayers()
      getOnlinePlayers is a getter for the list of online players
      Returns:
      a list of the names (String) of the online players

    • moveTiles

      public void moveTiles(List<Tile> tiles, int shelfColumn, String player) throws IllegalMoveException, GameEndedException
      This method is used to move tiles from the living room to a player's shelf
      Parameters:
      tiles - are the tiles the player wants to take
      shelfColumn - is the column of the shelf the player wants to move their tiles into
      player - is the player that moves the tiles
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if the move is not valid
      GameEndedException - if the game is already ended

    • createGame

      public void createGame() throws GameCreationException
      Method used to create a game
      Throws:
      GameCreationException - if the number of players is not sufficient

    • createGame

      public void createGame(boolean isTest) throws GameCreationException, NotTestException
      Method used to create a game, used only for tests
      Parameters:
      isTest - used to check if the method is call during a test
      Throws:
      GameCreationException - if the number of players is not sufficient
      NotTestException - if isTest is not true

    • checkNumberOfPlayers

      public boolean checkNumberOfPlayers()
      Method used to check if the number of players is enough to continue playing
      Returns:
      true if the number of players is more than 2, false otherwise

    • waitForPlayers

      public boolean waitForPlayers()
      is a method that waits for player to reconnect to the lobby. After a timeout if no player has reconnected is returned false, otherwise is returned true
      Returns:
      true if the number of player still in game is at least 2, false if there are no player in game

    • getGameInfo

      public GameInfo getGameInfo()
      getGameInfo is a getter for the information about the game
      Returns:
      the reference to game info

    • getInitialGameInfo

      public InitialGameInfo getInitialGameInfo()
      getInitialGameInfo is a getter for the complete information about the current game
      Returns:
      the reference to the game info created at the beginning of the game

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public String getCurrentPlayer()
      getCurrentPlayer is a getter for the name of the current player
      Returns:
      the name (String) of the player that can play in this turn

    • getDisconnectedPlayers

      public List<String> getDisconnectedPlayers()
      getDisconnectedPlayers is a getter for the list of the names of the disconnected players
      Returns:
      the list of disconnected players

    • isGameCreated

      public boolean isGameCreated()
      isGameCreated is a method used whether a game has been created
      Returns:
      true if the game has been created, false otherwise

    • nextPlayer

      public VirtualPlayer nextPlayer()
      nextPlayer is the method used to calculate the next player in the game
      Returns:
      the next player in the game, null if there is no player in the game

    • isLastPlayer

      public boolean isLastPlayer()
      isLastPlayer is a function used to test if the current player is the last one
      Returns:
      true if the current player is the last player among the online players

    • getPlayer

      public VirtualPlayer getPlayer(String name) throws PlayerNotInLobbyException
      getPlayer is a getter for class that representing a player given its name
      Parameters:
      name - name of the virtual player
      Returns:
      the reference to the virtual player corresponding to the parameter
      Throws:
      PlayerNotInLobbyException - if the name asked is not an online player

    • disconnectPlayer

      public void disconnectPlayer(VirtualPlayer player)
      Disconnects a player from the lobby
      Parameters:
      player - is the player that is being disconnected
